DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study to evaluate the impact of an educational programme about diabetes, comparing to normal clinical practice, on treatment compliance and disease control of people with type 2 diabetes followed in the primary care units in Portugal.
DOC.brief_title: Better Diabetes Control, Quality - Educate to Achieve Compliance.
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective study to evaluate the impact of an educational programme about diabetes focusing on treatment compliance, exercise and nutrition, comparing to normal clinical practice, on treatment compliance and disease control of people with type 2 diabetes followed in the primary care units in Portugal.
DOC.criteria: Individuals with type 2 diabetes HbA1c <= 8,5% Treated with oral antidiabetics for at least 6 months Treatment with insulin
